mapper.select: select * from user u order by u.createDate asc limit #{start},#{maxSize}
select count(*) from user u where u.remoteIp = #{remoteIp}
select * from user u where u.nickName = #{nickName} and u.password = #{password}
select * from user u where u.userId = #{userId}
select * from user u where u.userId in ((select friendAId from friendTab t where t.friendBId = #{userId}) and (select friendBId from friendTab t where t.friendAId = #{userId}))
mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, nickName, password, remoteIp, userPicture, createDate) values(#{userId}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{remoteIp}, #{userPicture}, now())
mapper.update: update user set user.nickName = #{nickName}, user.password = #{password}, user.userPicture = #{userPicture} where user.userId = #{userId}
